Name: Add GET /areas/:id endpoint
Description: Implement GET /areas/:id to return a single AREA with joined action & reaction metadata; protect route with auth middleware.
Acceptance Criteria: GET /areas/:id returns 200 with area object including actions and reactions fields for authenticated user; mobile AreaDetailsScreen loads correctly.

Name: Add reaction config endpoint
Description: Add GET /services/:serviceSlug/reactions/:reactionName/config that returns reaction UI/config schema.
Acceptance Criteria: Endpoint returns JSON schema or ui_schema for a reaction; mobile and web can fetch and render fields.

Name: Implement provider helper endpoints (GitHub repos)
Description: Add endpoint to return user's GitHub repositories used by UI selects; use stored OAuth token.
Acceptance Criteria: GET /services/github/repos returns array of repos (value/label) for authenticated user; UI dropdown populates when token present and returns empty list when not connected.

Name: Implement provider helper endpoints (Discord channels)
Description: Add endpoint to return user's Discord channels/guild channels to populate selects (use bot token or user token as appropriate).
Acceptance Criteria: GET /services/discord/channels returns channel list (id/name) when token or bot invite available; UI can consume it.

Name: Add .env.example and document env vars
Description: Create `server/.env.example` listing required environment variables and update README with explanation.
Acceptance Criteria: Developer can populate .env from example; server warns but does not crash silently; README lists required keys and callback URLs.

Name: Harmonize action/reaction UI schema naming
Description: Ensure `ui_schema`/`config_schema` naming is consistent in service payloads and config endpoints; expose reaction schemas in /services response.
Acceptance Criteria: Frontends (mobile + web) receive consistent `ui_schema` for actions and reactions and parsing logic works without warnings.

Name: Verify Web Dockerfile serves client.apk
Description: Confirm `Web` Dockerfile/nginx config is set to serve `/client.apk` from shared volume; adjust if necessary.
Acceptance Criteria: After docker-compose up, http://localhost:8081/client.apk returns file and healthcheck passes.

Name: Add HOWTOCONTRIBUTE.md
Description: Create contribution guide explaining how to add new services, actions, reactions and how to run tests locally.
Acceptance Criteria: Guide contains step-by-step to add a service module, DB schema hints, example code snippet, testing notes and where to update registry.

Name: Implement GET /services/:serviceSlug/reactions/:reactionName/config (server route)
Description: Add route mapping and controller method specifically for reaction config endpoint (complements action config route).
Acceptance Criteria: Route responds with JSON schema for reaction or 404 if not found. Frontends call this route successfully.

Name: Add missing client-side stubs for unavailable provider data
Description: If provider APIs cannot be implemented now, add server-side stubs that return safe, descriptive placeholder arrays to avoid frontend crashes.
Acceptance Criteria: Frontend selects show placeholder options and no errors occur when providers not connected.

Name: Add unit/integration tests for cron runner (processArea)
Description: Create tests that simulate area records and verify trigger/execute flow with mocks for actions/reactions and token retrieval.
Acceptance Criteria: CI runs tests and they validate processArea triggers reactions as expected and updates last_executed_at.

Name: Add CI workflow (lint/tests/build)
Description: Add GitHub Actions workflow to run lint, tests, and optionally build for Web and server on PR.
Acceptance Criteria: PRs run lint + unit tests; pipeline fails on lint/test errors.

Name: Frontend: Add GET /areas/:id usage fallback check
Description: Update mobile/web to gracefully fallback to list filtering if GET /areas/:id temporarily missing (short-term fix).
Acceptance Criteria: Apps handle missing endpoint gracefully with user message and instruction to refresh. (Temporary)

Name: UX: Improve CreateAreaWizard validation
Description: Add client-side validation for required fields from ui_schema and clear error messages before submitting createArea.
Acceptance Criteria: Required field flags shown, prevent submission when validation fails, and display which fields are missing.

Name: Inventory & map service implementations
Description: Document each service module and list implemented action/reaction slugs for project README and HOWTOCONTRIBUTE.
Acceptance Criteria: README/HowTo includes table listing services and their action/reaction slugs; getAllServices reports them in /about.json.

Name: Refactor service registry logging
Description: Make service loader warnings/errors clearer and produce a list at startup for missing DB/runtime mismatches.
Acceptance Criteria: Startup log prints summary: loaded services, missing implementations, and mismatched slugs.

Name: Optional: Add example supabase SQL or migration
Description: Provide migration SQL snippets or a dump for tables: users, services, actions, reactions, areas, oauth_tokens.
Acceptance Criteria: Developers can run provided SQL to create required tables and sample data for local dev.
